name: liquid-node
description: Node.js port of Tobias LÃ¼tke's Liquid template engine.

scripts.coverage: npm run compile && LIQUID_NODE_COVERAGE=1 mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register -r jscoverage --reporter mocha-lcov-reporter test | coveralls
scripts.coverage-report: npm run compile && LIQUID_NODE_COVERAGE=1 mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register -r jscoverage --covout html test

readme:
# Liquid with Node.js

This is a fork of the original [liquid-node](https://github.com/sirlantis/liquid-node), with added support for multi-line tags.
